author: rcm
msg: Added simple check to AwtText to catch problem with .NET returning spurious incorrect value for width of a drawn string.  When detected manually calculating the string width.

msg: Added wrapped text and password fields to the view factory.

msg: Modified debug view so that all data extraction is done in the Dump class (so it can be reused) rather than within the view itself.
